text: Bhannus ki, aphno saksiharula'i lya'u, jasale gavahi de'un ki allahale yi kuraharula'i tyajya bana'eko cha. Ani yadi tiniharu a'era gavahi dinchan bhane tapa'i tiniharuko satha saksi nabasnus ra kadapi tiniharuko icchako pachi nahidnu jasale hamra ayataharula'i galata bhanirakheka chan ra jo paralokako dinama visvasa gardainan, ra aphno palanakartako samakaksa arula'i pani thandachan
